content: Have you explored outside yet? Many Planets have a special mineral called rutile ore...
Yep, those ones on the ground that make a crisp sound when you hit 'em with a mattock. Wanna give it a shot, bhan?
If someone's making furniture out of stone, I absolutely have to see that!
【Test】{M_LookAtMe}You can always find nice <color=#fb9b3d>hats</color> at the Loomi Market
【Test】{M_LookAtMe}I heard Glenn's been peddling <color=#fb9b3d>crop seeds</color>, that sneaky merchant!
[Test] {M_LookAtMe}After obtaining furniture blueprints, you can craft <color=#fb9b3d>furniture</color> at the <color=#fb9b3d>workbench</color>.
{M_LookAtMe}In just <color=#fb9b3d>two days</color>, <color=#fb9b3d>crops</color> will grow in the field. Don't forget to water them!
【Test】{M_LookAtMe}Give the <color=#fb9b3d>freshwater fish</color> to <color=#fb9b3d>Mors</color>, and he will record its biological information in the Omnipedia for everyone to reference.
{M_LookAtMe}You're more likely to catch giant <color=#fb9b3d>ground beetles</color> in areas with lush vegetation.
{M_LookAtMe}You're more likely to catch giant <color=#fb9b3d>freshwater fish</color> in areas with abundant rivers.
{M_LookAtMe}Giant insects are rare and are marked with a <color=#fb9b3d>star rating</color> in the Omnipedia.
【Test】{M_LookAtMe}Land on an <color=#fb9b3d>Exotic Planet</color> during <color=#fb9b3d>Starsea Exploration</color>
【Test】{M_LookAtMe}You're more likely to spot <color=#fb9b3d>butterflies</color> in areas with abundant flowers.
【Test】{M_LookAtMe}You're more likely to spot <color=#fb9b3d>butterflies</color> in areas with abundant flowers.
【Test】{M_LookAtMe}I heard that <color=#fb9b3d>Black Combat Boots</color> are the hottest item at Lili's shop right now
【Test】{M_LookAtMe}Give <color=#fb9b3d>insects</color> to <color=#fb9b3d>Mors</color>, and he will record their biological information in the Omnipedia for everyone to access anytime.
{M_LookAtMe}Giant freshwater fish are rare and are marked with a <color=#fb9b3d>star rating</color> in the Omnipedia.
{M_LookAtMe}After obtaining furniture blueprints, you can craft <color=#fb9b3d>furniture</color> at the <color=#fb9b3d>workbench</color>.
{M_LookAtMe}A stable Bubble World is perfect for growing plants. Just bury the <color=#fb9b3d>seeds</color> in the soil, and they'll quickly take root and grow into a field!
【Test】{M_LookAtMe}Give <color=#fb9b3d>insects</color> to <color=#fb9b3d>Mors</color>, and he will record their biological information in the Omnipedia for everyone to access.
【Test】{M_LookAtMe}I'm looking forward to finding new creative inspiration in <color=#fb9b3d>Starsea exploration</color>!
【Test】{M_LookAtMe}I heard that the <color=#fb9b3d>Polka Dot Tangerine Coat</color> is a hot item at Lili's shop lately!
{M_LookAtMe}A stable Bubble World is perfect for growing plants. Just bury the <color=#fb9b3d>seeds</color> in the soil, and they'll quickly take root and grow into a field!
【Test】{M_LookAtMe}<color=#fb9b3d>Mitai Home</color> will evaluate your house based on its layout.
{M_LookAtMe}Giant insects are rare and are marked with a <color=#fb9b3d>star rating</color> in the Omnipedia.
{M_LookAtMe}Giant butterflies are rare and are marked with a <color=#fb9b3d>star rating</color> in the Omnipedia.
{M_LookAtMe}You're more likely to catch giant <color=#fb9b3d>ground beetles</color> in areas with lush vegetation.
